name: Snake Reloaded Multiplayer
description:
This recreation of the classic snake game lets you battle your friend in the same arena!

Compete with opponent snake for food and points.

Eat the opponent to win the game!

GitHub Link: https://github.com/aviralgoel/Snake-2D-LocalMultiPlayer

  1. Standard Snake Game Rules Apply
  2. Collectibles as follows
    • Increase Speed
    • Increase Score Multiplier
    • Increment Size & Score
    • Decrement Size & Score
    • Become Invincible
  3. Two Player Input (WASD, Arrow Keys)
